comment: She is horrible. She is condescending and extremely unclear on her standards. She helped with formatting skills, but other thqn , personally I hated her. Thank you.

You should probably take someone else if you have the opportunity. All the other comments that she can be rude and kind of moody are true. One minute she's smiling and laughing, the next she's mad about something. She makes it very clear when she thinks your question is stupid. I avoided talking to her at all costs.

Her attitude...whole 'nother comment section. As for the class. She has a strict format she wants your papers in, once you get that done you'll do better. I personally wasn't fond of her. Take at own risk. I will admit she became more helpful towards the end.

Rude, condescending, not helpful. If you asked any questions she would argue with you that you haven't been listening. I couldn't get any help from her and neither could any of the other students. I finally dropped the class when she said she was grading my emails..(?!)
She was difficult in that she wanted you to write in one way and that way only. Take notes, and follow every word she says and the class is and can be easy.

In her Syllabus, she states that she gives most students a C. If you go above and beyond you will get a B, maybe a low A. She can be very rude at times to the point where motivation is lost, and rarely she is nice. If you aren't a strong writer, please stay away. When you think you meet her expectations, just know in reality you haven't.

I took this class as a hybrid, and it was pretty easy. The only work we did was 3 essays all semester, and then a portfolio with the 3 revised essays that count as the final. Yes, she can be rude and unhelpful at times, but if you do exactly as she asks then you will be fine. Her essays are very detailed,and you must follow close directions.

The class was okay. There aren' many grades. Just 3 papers to write, some posts, and a final potfolio which is just a revision of your first 3 papers. However, she is VERY rude and not willing to help. If you ask her a question, she looks at you like your dumb and doesn't answer it. She also does stupid mandatory peer editing that is POINTLESS.

AVOID THIS TEACHER! She is incredibly condescending and rude. Your grade is determined by 3 papers, 3 online dicussions, and a final portfolio. I went to the writing center for each paper and they pretty much did it for me & still did not score higher than a C+ on any of my papers. Jumped down many students' throats when asked questions! DON'T TAKE

I recommend not taking this professor for your intro courses.  Entirely unhelpful and unwilling to work with you on a personal individual basis.  Why is she doing this work if she really doesn't like helping students understand the material and develop their skills as academic writers?  Go work at a gas station for gods-sakes!
Highly suggest not taking this professor. The course is easy but the professor has no enthusiasm and is very dry. You will have three papers three discussion board postings and a final portfolio.

Please! I beg of you do not take this professor!!! I might not know who you are, but i care enough about you to beg not to take her. I use to love writing til she came along. You are forced to do her rules, her format, her way of thinking. Her limitations and her sarcasm inhibit your learning, creativity, and success.

Do not recommend taking her. She's condesending and rude at times. Not very personable or approachable. If you take notes and do EXACTLY what she says in your paper you MIGHT get a B but not likely. She's dry and lifeless and has HORRIBLE penmanship so good luck taking notes. Find another teacher if possible!

Do not take her if you can avoid it. She is rude & condescending. I asked her to clarify a comment on one of my essays & she said "if you don't know the answer to that, you shouldn't have gotten the grade you got." I went to the writing center and even they couldn't figure out what I was doing wrong. Oh & she doesn't give numerical grades. You have no way of figuring out where you stand. Essays are graded on the ABC scale & everything else is S or U.
Sarcastic! The hybrid class was good. This professor is reasonable and just wants to see progression and involvement. If you do that, then you'll be fine.

Attendance is mandatory. Three papers and the final is a portfolio of all your previous papers(refined). Very opinionated(kinda rude), but wants students to succeed. To stay on her good side, BE INVOLVED in discussions and make sure you know what you're talking about. Easy A if you listen and DO exactly what she asks.

Took the hybrid and loved it. She goes over her expectations for the papers very clearly the class before they are due. Just listen and do exactly what she wants. Fix the mistakes she mentions in her feedback. Very rude but very easy and helpful.
Shes rude but actually very helpful. Go to class everyday and do the assignments you'll come out fine. Rude but easy. You'll pass

Her class was not hard, but she can be extremely rude and does not like to be corrected. You must pay attention to everything that she says when it comes to formatting your papers. Attendance is imperative or you will miss something important. Stay on her good side, do what you are asked, and you will receive an A or B.
Don't take her, she is intimidating and will treat you badly in class. You will have to work hard for a passing grade.
Very boring class. She is not very sympathetic but she will help you during office hours if you don't understand something. Typical English class

Very DIFFICULT! Hard to understand, annoying voice, etc. She knows the subject, but doesn't know how to teach it. If you've been to the Military Services you probably can survive her classes...no kidding! I would stay FAR AWAY!

Her voice is like nails on a chalkboard like someone already said. She is rude, opinionated, and for some reason did not like me at all. AVOID HER AT ALL COSTS. She is awful. By far the worst teacher I've had at KSU. Plus she teaches you absolutely nothing.

Ugh!I absolutely cannot stand her.She has an attitude problem and is very sarcastic and rude.She always calls people out on being wrong.She gives easy quizes,that is the only thing I enjoy about her class.

She is awful her attitude is piss poor. She will ask for your opinion and tell you are wrong. Good luck if you take her she is a witch. Also be prepared for a lecture on what to call her and why it takes her 15-20 minutes to explain why you call her DR and not MRS.

I HATED her. Her voice was like nails on a chalkboard, she is ridiculously opinionated, rude, and generally irritating, not to mention tactless, sarcastic, and generally annoying. Plus, any time you ask a question she embarrasses you in front of everyone.

Great English teacher, I had her for summer semester and she kept my interest all the way through. She answers emails promptly, and as long as you do as you are supposed to and do (your papers and rough drafts) you will get a B or an A. She focuses on one subject throughout which is nice and had me doing new things GREAT TEACHER WOULD RECOMMEND!

I took her online class. Very easy for me. She did not mind helping and would try to help out as much as possible. Also, she lets you turn in a rough draft for editing before you turn in your final, so that helps a lot.

Not the best, not the worst. She makes mistakes often and doesn't like being called out on them. Isn't the most tactful teacher either. Still, do the writing assignments, she'll tell you what you need to fix, do what she says, and you'll get an A.

This class is EASY if you simply do the work. The quizzes are easy-can read sparknotes and get by. Her tests are a walk in the park and it seems hard to fail the discussion questions. However, her attitude is ridiculous. She has a very sharp tongue and needles her students, especially if you don't contribute regularly. Be on her good side=B or A.

Very great prof.  I would recommend to anyone wanting to improve their writing.  She is TOUGH but fair.  Pay attention to comments on her papers and improve them.  She will actually help you unlike most profs.  She does care about your interest level, and she does grade harsher on those that aren't trying or contributing.  Pet = Win.
I was terrified of college english. However, this professor grades papers very fairly. Not a ton of work, and standards are well-known. I recommend.
Excellent teacher, I really learned a lot. Great discussions. Do your assignments and pay attention you will do great.
Great teacher, even though I cannot stand English

DO NOT miss class. Act interested every once in a while and give your two cents at least once a class. Some of the readings sucked, and they were long. She gives 10 quizzes and if youve read you'll do fine. Do the discussion topics and you'll be fine in the class. Wasnt that bad.

First of all, She is fond of giving C's on papers so pay attention to the comments she writes on graded papers & ask ?'s to improve your grade. She notices that you care and she keeps it in mind.Be sure to NOT repeat mistakes that she has commented on in your next paper.PAY CLOSE ATTENTION TO FORMATING!Do your work & do it on time & you'll be ok.

Try to find out before the class starts whether it is a special topic course.  Class I took in Spring '09 was a survey celebrity culture.  If that interests you, then have fun.  I hated it though.  She's not very nice, offers help, but when you ask for help, she gives you a big attitude.  Grading is clear and concise.  I'll avoid her in the future.

When it came writing papers she was never to clear about how she wanted it. The topics were not always clear. She gave a lot of quizes and the stories took a long time to read. The stories that she selected however, were interesting.

Terrible Professor! I'm a transfer student who needed this class (class did not transfer) and regret taking it. Her speech impediment made it difficult to understand her and her attitude is snotty. She is willing to help if you ask, but prepare to be humiliated. Her teaching style is ridiculous! I took this class awhile back, but appears the same!!
She is the worst professor I have ever had. She is a "much know" kind of a person. What she teaches is not something you will benefit from. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS.
She was completly unproffessionial. She refused to help students and when she did take questions she treated the students like they were stupid. The worst teacher in the world. DO NOT TAKE HER!

Horrible teacher. I have never made a B on a paper in my life and thats all she gave anyone. She has horrible mood swings and is very rude. Only cares about celebrities and thats all you write about. Her grading system is completely stupid. DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!!!!!

This is the worst teacher I have ever had in my life! She is very stuck up and rude. She gets mad over some of the dumbest things ever (like not paper clipping your paper correctly). I already did not like English already, but she made it that much worse! I think she should really stop teaching. I would hate to see how she treats her kids at home.

Useless Teacher.She is not emotionaly balanced.Totally waste of time. She focuses on trivial stuff like formatting. if you are intereted in learning about ethos, logos and pathos then go ahead and take it from her otherwise find a different teacher.She is more concern about taking attendance than teaching Eng.Needs psychological evaluation.

Very cold & unapproachable. Makes course harder than necessary. Doesn't teach anything. Most of class time wasted on irrelevant things and she is more stuck on format than teaching English. She is very egocentric.You wouldn't learn a thing except logos, pathos and ethos.Take it at your own risk.Waste of time.Ksu should get rid of her

One of the worse professors. the first 2 weeks were fine, but it went downhill from there. i'm very interested in enlish but her essay topics are boring and repetitive. her class discussions are also boring and she is condescending, cold and sarcastic. avoid her class!

Worst proffesor ever, please do not taake her class.she tends to have mood swings where she'll be happy then she'll snap at you the next. she is also very very picky about things and if she doesnt like somthing she will let you know in an angry tone. she tries to make her class more important than it really is so if you go about like that class isn
Very Hard. You will hate your life the whole time your in this class. Very stressful. Contradicts herself a lot. Very picky, has major issues with people using different versions of Microsoft word.

Awesome teacher.  Really helps out and tries to teach her students how and what to write.  Grading is easy and not that many assignments due.  Work days on Friday's are awesome, practically a free day. I recommend highly.
Grades very easy, however she makes you write a bunch of papers

She's nice, but it's hard to pay attention. Her speech impediment made it hard to understand her sometimes. The class is easy and she grades fair. If you don't do something right, such as the heading, or she thinks you did it wrong, your grade will suffer.
